root.name: Bomberman Online
root.description: GAME MODESSurvival Mode - This mode is your standard bomberman, last one alive wins the matchHyper Bomberman - Collect 3 Target Items then make your way to the gate for the winPanel Paint - Your flames paint the panels with the color of your bomberman, the one with the most panels winsSubmarine - This for 2 teams of 2. The battle field is divided in half, when you lay your bombs on your side, it counts down then is sent like a torpedo to the corresponding sideRing Mode - A small battle field 5 x 7, with no blocks to hide around, no power ups, just one bomb. Bombs also fall from the sky. Set fire to your opponents to score a ring out, the most right outs at the end of the time wins.Other Info1-4 playersOnline Multiplayer/ Modem compatibleVMU compatible: 5 blocksVGA box compatible
